entities.description: The month in the current year in which the survey respondent last used marijuana or any cannabis product.
The month in the prior year in which the survey respondent last used marijuana or any cannabis product.
The month in the current year in which the survey respondent last smoked part or all of a cigarette.
The month in the year prior to the current year in which the survey respondent last smoked part or all of a cigarette.
The month two years prior to the current year in which the survey respondent last smoked part or all of a cigarette.

relationships.description: Relates the respondent to the month in the current year in which they last used cannabis.
Relates the respondent to the month in the prior year in which they last used cannabis.
Relates the respondent to the month in the current year in which they last smoked a cigarette.
Relates the respondent to the month in the year prior to the current year in which they last smoked a cigarette.
Relates the respondent to the month two years prior to the current year in which they last smoked a cigarette.
